Text: ALL of the 'Dancing Bear' on TPB R complete bull$hit ~ just a bunch of fat ugly skanks suking cok = lameness.  There R 3 scenes I am looking 4 - the only 1's good from this producer apparently - some sleek brunette chik in a couch getting nailed, a  pretty redhead 'on' a couch being rammed, & some cute Latin with a ridiculous Bob Marley tat being hammered in some club.  Apparently everything else from this company is an absolute snore.  Say hello 2 the delete button  =))
